pullRequest.title: [ML] During Inference do not summerize importance for custom features
pullRequest.bodyText:
If a feature is created via a custom pre-processor,
we should return the importance for that feature.
This means we will not return the importance for the
original document field for custom processed features.
closes #59330

commit.message:
[ML] do not summerize importance for custom features

If a feature is created via a custom pre-processor,
we should return the importance for that feature.

This means we will not return the importance for the
original document field for custom processed features.

closes https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/59330

nodes.bodyText: An alternative to consider would be .filter(not(PreProcessor::isCustom))
